verses.esv:
6   Set me as a seal upon your heart,
    as a seal upon your arm,
  for love is strong as death,
    jealousy is fierce as the grave.
  Its flashes are flashes of fire,
    the very flame of the LORD.
verses.kjv: 6 Set me as a seal upon thine heart, as a seal upon thine arm: for love is strong as death; jealousy is cruel as the grave: the coals thereof are coals of fire, which hath a most vehement flame.
verses.niv: 6 Place me like a seal over your heart, like a seal on your arm; for love is as strong as death, its jealousy unyielding as the grave. It burns like blazing fire, like a mighty flame.

verses.esv: 5 The aim of our charge is love that issues from a pure heart and a good conscience and a sincere faith.
verses.kjv: 5 Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart, and of a good conscience, and of faith unfeigned:
verses.niv: 5 The goal of this command is love, which comes from a pure heart and a good conscience and a sincere faith.

verses.esv: 16 And he took them in his arms and blessed them, laying his hands on them.
verses.kjv: 16 And he took them up in his arms, put his hands upon them, and blessed them.
verses.niv: 16 And he took the children in his arms, put his hands on them and blessed them.

verses.esv: 7:1 Now concerning the matters about which you wrote: “It is good for a man not to have sexual relations with a woman.”
verses.kjv: 1 Now concerning the things whereof ye wrote unto me: It is good for a man not to touch a woman.
verses.niv: 1 Now for the matters you wrote about: It is good for a man not to marry.

verses.esv:
6   His left hand is under my head,
    and his right hand embraces me!
verses.kjv: 6 His left hand is under my head, and his right hand doth embrace me.
verses.niv: 6 His left arm is under my head, and his right arm embraces me.
